page.title: 07FINZEAN SUNDAY SCHOOL1960-85
page.content:
{ ROLL STAFF BIBLE CLASS (3-12yrs) (13-18yrs) 1960 25# 2 7+leader 1970 20# 2 0- no support 1980 15# 1
#Regular att.=20 in 60's,15 in 70's. *Regular att.=6 pupils on average. {SCHEME OF WORK 1960's Bible Study and prayer 1970's Bible Study,prayer,singing drama,painting 1980's 'Children of the Way' and 'Faithquest'-materials as published:Church of Scotland Prayer,singing,drama,paints. {Annual picnic}provided by Women's Guild,now at Finzean Church but in 60's and 70's at Forest of Birse and attended by elders,pupils and parents.
